localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

You find yourself stuck Down in the Valley in an endless cycle of shooting mobs, collecting power-ups, and chasing a higher score that can only be ended by being brought down by those evil mobs. Three themes to select and play, how will you fare Down in the Valley?

Package size: 253 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)

© 2014 Jacky King

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
